document.title: Reorganization of the University of Tennessee making University of Tennessee, Knoxville and the University of Tennessee Health Science Center separate entities (UTK Notification)

field.name: comments
field.value: This is a notification of a substantive change (defined by SACSCOC as "a significant modification or expansion of the nature and scope of an accredited institution") sent by the University of Tennessee to the SACSCOC for a response.
